name: @paretoman/votekit-demo
description: Demo site showing use of votekit

scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run jekyll && npm run jekyll:local
scripts.push-site-prep: cd _site && git init && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m localPush && git remote add origin https://github.com/paretoman/votekit.git && git status
scripts.push-site: npm run push-site-prep && cd _site && git push -u origin gh-pages -f

author: paretoman (https://paretoman.github.io)
